reviewText: For anyone who wants to get their kids to learn Portugese and loves to dance and sing, this video has it! I'm a Brasilian living in here in the states with 2 daughters trying to get them to learn portugese at the sametime is hard, this is great for any infant, toddlers or young at heart adults to learn portugese, and there is English subtitles to follow along.  Definately pick this up and I bet you will want to whole series.
